body:
Steve: Yeah, Thor and I don’t really go for pet names.

Tony: Interesting. Say, you know what most babies start off calling their fathers?

Steve: Daddy?

Thor (from the kitchen): Is Tony gone? Grab the lube and harnesses and wait in the bedroom like a good boy.

Steve: …

Tony: Don’t ever lie to me again.

I keep having dreams about seeing Avengers 4. One of them had the first half of the movie being about Pepper trying to hunt down and save Tony in her Rescue gear.

Another involved Tony and Steve sneaking through some giant Alien ship together.

title: After
body:
After, he didn’t move for 5 days. 

He sat on the red rubble clutching his muddy wrist for five days, waiting, willing, for the damn thing to start turning to dust. 

He waited, wheezing and coughing up blood from his ruptured lung, to die. 

Except, he never did. 

Anthony Edward Stark sat in the middle of a dead planet, surrounded by the ashes of the kid and waited for a death that never came. 

He was so goddamned tired of not dying.

–

On the sixth day, he pushed himself off the ground, stumbled towards the blue woman that had set Quill off earlier and said, “I could fix that for you”

She looked up from where she was re-arranging wires in her left arm, pulled out a knife that he wasn’t aware she had, and slashed him against the cheek. 

The metallic tang was becoming a familiar taste against his tongue

He staggered back a few steps as she leapt up, pressing the point of her blade against his adam’s apple.

“Are you going to kill me?” he asked after she didn’t move for 5 minutes.

“Yes, she replied, her voice gravelly.

He smiled his first smile in 6 days, “Good.”

She sheathed her blade and thrust her hand towards him, “Fix it or I cut off your head.”

“Don’t tempt me,” he said back, before flexing his fingers so that the nanotech would retract and leave his fingers barren. 

–

On the tenth day she said, “I am Nebula, daughter of Thanos and sister to Gamora”

–

On the twelfth day he replied, “I am Tony, son of Howard and brother to -” he took a rattling breath, “James Rhodes.”

–

On the thirteenth day she said, “Thanos knew your name.”

He replied, “He’s been in my head for 6 years. He knows a lot more than that I presume”

She shifted so she was facing him, her one metallic eye whirring softly, “I have known Thanos for 500 years. I have never known Thanos to fear anyone. And then I watch as he fights you. And I know Thanos to fear one person.”

Tony smiled, all bloody teeth and curled lip, “If you could make God bleed,” he whispered, pausing his fiddling in her leg, “people would cease to believe in Him” 

–

On the twenty third day, she pushed him off her flesh shoulder and declared, “We leave for Terran today.”

He froze, ice seeping through his veins before he managed, “There’s nothing left on Earth for me. I failed.”

She spun around on her heel, both eyes fixated on him, “You go back for your Rhodey,” and then softer, “and you stay for me.”

He furrowed his brows, “What do you have on Earth?”

“I have a raccoon to yell out,” she said, joints clinking softly as she bent down to pull him up and shoulder his weight, “and I was promised a new body.” 

He swallowed, “Okay. We’ll go to Earth. But don’t expect your pet to be alive.” 

She clicked her tongue against her mouth, lips spread into a full smile, “He is like you, unkillable. Trust me, I have tried,” she braced her arm against his chest as she eased him up the ramp of the space craft, “And he is like me, unmade. You will like him, a shiny broken thing for you to collect.”

–

On the two hundred and fifty sixth day, he fell out of Nebula’s arms and into Rhodey’s and had enough to presence to digest that Rhodey was alive before he collapsed. 

–

On the two hundred and seventieth day, he opened his eyes to the looming figures of Helen and a young woman, and passed out again

–

On the two hundred and seventy first day, he woke up thrashing and screaming against restraints around his limbs under sturdy arms pushed back against his shoulders and his eyes latched onto- “Platypus?”

He felt Rhodey hum against him as the restraints were removed and Rhodey shifted him so he was enveloped by Rhodey’s form- his head against Rhodey’s chest and Rhodey’s chin on his shoulder. 

“You had us worried for a second Tones.”

Tony closed his eyes and pressed against Rhodey’s chest; smiling softly as the arms around him tightened and grounded him. 

“Us?” he whispered after a few seconds

He felt Rhodey nudge him until he opened his eyes to meet him.

“Yeah Tones,” Rhodey said, eyes crinkling, “I don’t think Nebula left your bedside for the first week, muttering and grumbling under her breath about how her stupid mechanic was trying to be the biggest broken thing”

Tony grinned, “Isn’t she amazing?”

Rhodey chuckled softly, “A fine addition to your collection of shiny, broken things”

“She told you about that did she?”

“Yeah, we bonded over the past 2 weeks. You terrified us Tones. All of us. Even Rogers.”

Tony didn’t know what to say to that, so he just wriggled a little and leaned more heavily against Rhodey; smiling when he caught the glint of metal in the crumpled figure at the foot of his bed.

–

On the two hundred and seventy seventh day, he woke up to sunlight on his face, Rhodey behind him and Nebula sprawled against him; and felt something settle inside for the first time since- since, since.

–

On the three hundredth day, he hobbled up to Rogers; Rhodey and Nebula supporting him under each arm and said, “I know how to get them all back.”

Fin.

On the three hundredth day, he hobbled up to Rogers; Rhodey and Nebula supporting him under each arm and said, “I know how to get them all back.”

Fin.

blog.name: toast-ranger-to-a-stranger
blog.title: TOASTRANGER
blog.description: Cass. 24. Teacher. University graduate. Grad school hopeful. Bad writer. Buy me a coffee here: http://ko-fi.com/toastranger

summary: If you are in any way up for it I would love to see anything Tony/Rhodey.
question: If you are in any way up for it I would love to see anything Tony/Rhodey.
answer:
Sometimes, when Tony’s feeling off his game, when he’s too big for his own skin and feels like crawling right out of it, he steals Rhodey’s clothes.  Goes rummaging until he can find the cleanest thing Rhodey’s worn recently and slides right in. 

Rhodey’s always been a little bigger than him– in all departments– and Tony loves the way his MIT sweatshirt hangs off of him.  The way he has to roll up his sleeves to do anything.  

That’s how Rhodey finds him, on those days.  Curled on on the couch or in bed, in one of his sweatshirts, or old cotton tees, or sweats.  

One time, he even found him in a pair of his socks. 

And every time, without fail, Rhodey smiles, pads over, and kisses Tony’s head, his cheek, his lips.  Gentle and sweet.  Just like Rhodey knows he needs.  

“Honeybear,” Tony sighs, arching up, catching him around the neck and dragging him close over top of him.  

“Tones,” Rhodey smiles against his mouth.  “Rough day?” 

“The worst,” Tony says, and smiles too.  “Better now that you’re here.” 

And it is.

tags: tony stark x plus size reader
title: Headcanon: Beautiful
body:
Requested by anonymous: Hey girly❤️can I have a Tony Stark x Black Reader where the reader has an eating disorder and Steve and Natasha make fun of it causing her to feel more self conscious about herself. Tony and the team later  catches her trying to vomit out everything she eats. He comforts her and tells her that she’s beautiful and doesn’t need to change for anyone. Steve and Natasha apologizes after a confrontation with Tony

Pairing:  Black plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): mention of fat shaming, mention of vomitting

Word count:  607


-Your weight had always been a major insecurity of yours, after joining the avengers., you didn’t know that your weight would still be an issue, but not only for yourself. Natasha had never liked you from the second you joined the team and didn’t keep her dislike for you to herself

-She always mumbled a comment about your weight under her breath, it didn’t matter if you were training with Steve or just walking past the lounge in your sweats, she always made sure that you heard her mean comments

-Whenever you heard them you always did the same thing, first try to empty your stomach in the toilet before crying your heart out and then fall asleep with dried tear stains on your cheeks. Knew that you were hiding something but didn’t know what as you mostly shut down and pushed everyone away, not wanting to talk about your struggles

-One day, you had reached your breaking point when Natasha mumbled “God, [Y/N] slow down before you swallow the whole table” during lunch. Everybody was silent and stared shockingly at the agent while she took a sip of her drink, thinking that what she had done made her look cool

-you rushed off the table and to your room, already knowing what you felt like you had to do. You ran to the bathroom and knelt down in front of the toilet, trying to empty your stomach and not knowing that Tony and the rest of the team had followed you

-The sight of you crying and trying to empty your stomach broke their hears. “Get the hell out of here!” Tony hissed at Natasha who was shocked at his outburst but quickly left your room, the shame and guilt crashing over her

-Tony gently pulled you away from the toilet and wrapped his strong arms around your thick waist and held you close to him, let you cry on his shoulder while trying to voice the pain you were feeling in your heart

-The team gave the two of you some privacy while making their way to the lounge, knowing that Natasha would be there. Once they had found her sitting on the couch and fumbling with her fingers, they immediately confronted her of her disgusting behavior

-Upon seeing the whole team angered with her , she realized how much of a mean and fat shaming bitch she had been towards you and apologized for her behavior. “You don’t owe us an apology” Wanda hissed before she and Vision left the lounge, not being able to be in Natasha’s presence

-An hour later, you and Tony were cuddling on the bed. He held you close to him and let you rest your head on his chest while staring at the arc reactor. He whispered sweet things in your ear and occasionally gently lifted your head to press a tender kiss against your lips

-Tony had made you realize that you needed professional help and he made sure to let you know that you had his and the team’s support. “You will get through this, [Y/N] and come back stronger than ever” he whispered. You ended up falling asleep, exhausted from the previous events

-Natasha ended up apologizing to you which you accepted but made it clear that you weren’t going to be her friend, ever. “I will be able to co-exist with you but don’t want anything to do with you unless it’s about or during a mission” you strictly said to which she shamefully nodded her head as she had silently hoped that you would forgive and build up a friendship with her

-

tags: tony stark x plus size reader
title: One shot: First burn
body:
Requested by @x-avantgarde-x: May I request a Tony Stark one based on the song “First burn” from Hamilton? (I HAD TO 😂😭💖💖)

Pairing:  Plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): crying, language

Word count:  846


I saved every letter you wrote me
From the moment I saw you
I knew you were mine
You said you were mine
I thought you were mine

Do you know what Angelica said
When I told her what you’d done?
She said

“You have married an Icarus


He has flown too close to the sun”

 

Don’t take another step in my direction
I can’t be trusted around you
Don’t think you can talk your way
Into my arms, into my arms

I’m burning the letters you wrote me
You can stand over there if you want


I don’t know who you are
I have so much to learn
I’m re-reading your letters
And watching them burn (burn)

 

 

 

“Tony!” you yelled while your brother held you back, your body was trembling with so much anger while watching your sister quickly get off his lap and adjust her squirt while avoiding your gaze. Your husband let out shaky breaths while he stood up and zipped his pants back up clearing his throat.

“You bastard!” you continued to scream while tick tears rushed down your cheeks, blurring your vision as you still were struggling to get out of your brother’s grip so that you could teach your husband and sister a lesson.

“[Y/N]! It was never my intention to!” [Y/S/N] mumbled while finally meeting your angry gaze you scoffed and pushed your brother aside, finally freeing yourself from his tight grip and charging towards your sister, she clenched her eyes shut and didn’t move a muscle as she was willing to let you punch her.

But before you could even reach her, your brother was able to wrap his arms around your shoulders and hold you back while softly begging you to calm down and take deep breaths as violent wasn’t the right answer at that moment. You bit down onto your tongue, so hard that you could taste your own blood while slowly nodding your head, knowing that he was right.

You took deep breaths while swallowing the few drops of blood, but your hateful gaze never leaving your sister. She stood there with shaky legs and shot a glance at Henry, he slowly stood up and sighed, hating to see you in such distress.

 

I’m watching them burn (burn)

You published the letters she wrote to you
You told the whole world


How you brought this girl into our bed
In clearing your name, you have ruined our lives

Heaven forbid someone whisper

 

“He’s part of some scheme”

Your enemy whispers

 

So you have to scream

I know about whispers

I see how you look at my sister

Don’t

I’m not naive

I have seen women around you
Don’t

Think I don’t see

 

“We can explain” he mumbled while staring shamefully into your eyes, the love he once had for you absent. Your heart clenched painfully in your chest but you shook your head and clenched your jaw, more salty tears falling down your cheeks.

“No” you whispered and turned your head to your brother, “Please let me go. I promise that I won’t do anything” your voice cracked at the end as you really had calmed down, now only immense pain rushing through your body. He nodded his head and slowly released his arms from around your shoulders and took a step back, glaring at your sister.

Your husband took a step towards you but you shook your head and took one backwards, “No. Just speak” you whispered to which your sister walked up next to Henry and tried to say something but you cut her off, “Don’t you even fucking dare speaking. You’re dead to me so please do me a favor and get the fuck out of my sight” you hissed, breaking your sister’s heart but not caring at all.

She glanced at your brother for silent support but let out a soft cry upon seeing him scoff and mouth ”Get the fuck out of here” to her, making her burst out sobbing while rushing out of the house. Once she had slammed the door shut, Tony ran his hands through his hair, “[Y/N], babe, I am so sorry for what you just walked in on” he began but you let out a chuckle, slowly feeling the numbness take over you.

“You’re not sorry. You wanted out of this marriage and didn’t care how, so you clung onto the best opportunity which was my fame hungry sister” you stated, the tears slowly drying on your cheeks as you remembered how your sister suddenly felt the need to constantly be around you the second you and your husband began to have troubles in your marriage.

“At first, I was willing to let my anger and heartbreak get the best of me, show you my pain and vulnerability but now…I’m at peace” you whispered, shocking both your brother and husband. Tony frowned and shook his head in confusion, “Yesterday, I spent the whole day at the park, crying and praying to tumble upon a salutation to end all the pain I’ve been feeling, the pain you caused by being a bad husband” you explained and let out a loud sigh that echoed through the living room.

“Now I’ve come to realization that this is the salutation. My sister has never been a good sister to be, only took what she could get from me and ran off. And you…you’ve shown me that you’ve never loved me as much as I loved you. So, this is the salutation, get rid of the two people who caused me nothing but misery and so much pain” you finished and slowly nodded your head at your own words.

“I will get movers to get all my things and I’ll make send you the divorce files in the following days. Goodbye, Tony” you said while staring deeply into his eyes, yours empty while his were filled with so much shame, regret and pain.

“Let’s go” you turned around and let your brother let his arm supportively around your shoulder while making your way out of you and Tony’s once shared house, knowing that you had a long road of recovery ahead of you but also knowing that you would get out of is stronger than ever.

 

How they fall for your charms
All your charms

 

I’m erasing myself from the narrative
Let future historians wonder how Eliza reacted
When you broke her heart
You have thrown it all away
Stand back, watch it burn


Just watch it all burn

And when the time comes

Explain to the children

The pain and embarrassment

You put their mother through

When will you learn

That they are your legacy?
We are your legacy

If you thought you were mine (mine, mine)
Don’t

Requested by @x-avantgarde-x: May I request a Tony Stark one based on the song “First burn” from Hamilton? (I HAD TO 😂😭💖💖)

Pairing:  Plus sized reader x Tony Stark

Warning(s): crying, language

Word count:  846


I saved every letter you wrote me
From the moment I saw you
I knew you were mine
You said you were mine
I thought you were mine

Do you know what Angelica said
When I told her what you’d done?
She said

“You have married an Icarus


He has flown too close to the sun”

 

Don’t take another step in my direction
I can’t be trusted around you
Don’t think you can talk your way
Into my arms, into my arms

I’m burning the letters you wrote me
You can stand over there if you want


I don’t know who you are
I have so much to learn
I’m re-reading your letters
And watching them burn (burn)

 

 

 

“Tony!” you yelled while your brother held you back, your body was trembling with so much anger while watching your sister quickly get off his lap and adjust her squirt while avoiding your gaze. Your husband let out shaky breaths while he stood up and zipped his pants back up clearing his throat.

“You bastard!” you continued to scream while tick tears rushed down your cheeks, blurring your vision as you still were struggling to get out of your brother’s grip so that you could teach your husband and sister a lesson.

“[Y/N]! It was never my intention to!” [Y/S/N] mumbled while finally meeting your angry gaze you scoffed and pushed your brother aside, finally freeing yourself from his tight grip and charging towards your sister, she clenched her eyes shut and didn’t move a muscle as she was willing to let you punch her.

But before you could even reach her, your brother was able to wrap his arms around your shoulders and hold you back while softly begging you to calm down and take deep breaths as violent wasn’t the right answer at that moment. You bit down onto your tongue, so hard that you could taste your own blood while slowly nodding your head, knowing that he was right.

You took deep breaths while swallowing the few drops of blood, but your hateful gaze never leaving your sister. She stood there with shaky legs and shot a glance at Henry, he slowly stood up and sighed, hating to see you in such distress.

 

I’m watching them burn (burn)

You published the letters she wrote to you
You told the whole world


How you brought this girl into our bed
In clearing your name, you have ruined our lives

Heaven forbid someone whisper

 

“He’s part of some scheme”

Your enemy whispers

 

So you have to scream

I know about whispers

I see how you look at my sister

Don’t

I’m not naive

I have seen women around you
Don’t

Think I don’t see

 

“We can explain” he mumbled while staring shamefully into your eyes, the love he once had for you absent. Your heart clenched painfully in your chest but you shook your head and clenched your jaw, more salty tears falling down your cheeks.

“No” you whispered and turned your head to your brother, “Please let me go. I promise that I won’t do anything” your voice cracked at the end as you really had calmed down, now only immense pain rushing through your body. He nodded his head and slowly released his arms from around your shoulders and took a step back, glaring at your sister.

Your husband took a step towards you but you shook your head and took one backwards, “No. Just speak” you whispered to which your sister walked up next to Henry and tried to say something but you cut her off, “Don’t you even fucking dare speaking. You’re dead to me so please do me a favor and get the fuck out of my sight” you hissed, breaking your sister’s heart but not caring at all.

She glanced at your brother for silent support but let out a soft cry upon seeing him scoff and mouth ”Get the fuck out of here” to her, making her burst out sobbing while rushing out of the house. Once she had slammed the door shut, Tony ran his hands through his hair, “[Y/N], babe, I am so sorry for what you just walked in on” he began but you let out a chuckle, slowly feeling the numbness take over you.

“You’re not sorry. You wanted out of this marriage and didn’t care how, so you clung onto the best opportunity which was my fame hungry sister” you stated, the tears slowly drying on your cheeks as you remembered how your sister suddenly felt the need to constantly be around you the second you and your husband began to have troubles in your marriage.

“At first, I was willing to let my anger and heartbreak get the best of me, show you my pain and vulnerability but now…I’m at peace” you whispered, shocking both your brother and husband. Tony frowned and shook his head in confusion, “Yesterday, I spent the whole day at the park, crying and praying to tumble upon a salutation to end all the pain I’ve been feeling, the pain you caused by being a bad husband” you explained and let out a loud sigh that echoed through the living room.

“Now I’ve come to realization that this is the salutation. My sister has never been a good sister to be, only took what she could get from me and ran off. And you…you’ve shown me that you’ve never loved me as much as I loved you. So, this is the salutation, get rid of the two people who caused me nothing but misery and so much pain” you finished and slowly nodded your head at your own words.

“I will get movers to get all my things and I’ll make send you the divorce files in the following days. Goodbye, Tony” you said while staring deeply into his eyes, yours empty while his were filled with so much shame, regret and pain.

“Let’s go” you turned around and let your brother let his arm supportively around your shoulder while making your way out of you and Tony’s once shared house, knowing that you had a long road of recovery ahead of you but also knowing that you would get out of is stronger than ever.

 

How they fall for your charms
All your charms

 

I’m erasing myself from the narrative
Let future historians wonder how Eliza reacted
When you broke her heart
You have thrown it all away
Stand back, watch it burn


Just watch it all burn

And when the time comes

Explain to the children

The pain and embarrassment

You put their mother through

When will you learn

That they are your legacy?
We are your legacy

If you thought you were mine (mine, mine)
Don’t

blog.description:

body:
Peter: So, I grabbed a healthy breakfast.
Clint: Are those gummy bears wrapped in a fruit roll-up?
Peter: Breakfast burrito.
Clint: Sounds good, babe.

Peter: Ha! Joke's on you, I don't have one!
